module.name: HTML
module.param: testcase to make sure that the JSChart module can still be resized, and that multiple JSChart modules can exist on a page without interfering with eachother, and no js errors are thrown. Basically this tests various bugs in core Splunk as well as potential regressions from Sideview code patching those core problems.

module.name: Search
module.param: index=_internal source=*metrics.log group="per_sourcetype_thruput" | timechart count by series
